You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &auml

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Auml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c4/index.htm U+000C4].
  * `&Auml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c4/index.htm U+000C4].
  * `&auml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e4/index.htm U+000E4].
  * `&auml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e4/index.htm U+000E4].
